title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.75 - Additional sampling requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.75 - Additional sampling requirements

State Regulations
(a) Additional water samples for any contaminant shall be collected and analyzed from any public water system by the supplier of water as may be required by the State, to assure control of the quality of the public water system. (b) The State may collect and analyze water samples from any public water system at any time, either by its own personnel or by contract with others. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
5-1.75

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
